person.note: Cao(1) Yanyue [10840] First son Shichong (not in dataset), son of wife Xiao(1) Zhimin's [10865] daughter died young. Shikang (not in dataset) and Shigui [10843] were succesive sons of concubine Wang, a Raozhou, Poyang person, as was the wife of son-in-law, Niu(1) Douji [18459]. Shigui died three days after his father. The last two sons Shigun [12347] and Shimian [10844] were the sons of Huang(2) Gui's [10856] daughter as were the wives of his other two son-in-laws. Jiangxi TZ, 22.22a records him as a Hukou county jinshi in 1175, which may be an error for the year he received the juren degree. SHY:ZG, 74.34a; Liangchao beiyao, p. 790; Jiangxi TZ, 22.24a (as a Xingzi county resident); Wei Liaoweng, WJ, 87.14b-22b; Cao Yanyue, WJ, 20.26a-27a (concubine, born Wang, who died in 1222 at age 55). CBD, 3, 3211.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1208: Apt. Jinghu Bei tiju1209: In office as Jinghu Bei tiju1209: Apy. Jinghu Nan yunpan1210: Apt. prefect of Tanzhou from Jinghu Nan yunpan1215: Apt. Lizhou yunpan concurrently prefect of Lizhou1219: Apt. provisional Hubu shilang, declined and apt. prefect of Chengdu fu
